attributes.action: ban the use of percentages in all media.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People get confused when greeted with percentages in the media (newspapers, government propaganda etc). We petition the Prime Minister to put in place legislation that bans the use of percentages in the media and insteads forces simple numbers to be used instead. For example:

A 100% increase is misleading when the initial NUMBER is 2 for instance, so we now have 4 BUT the percentage figure hides the complete insignificance of the information put forward.
